meanings.definition: The muscles forming the rounded contour of the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The deltoidei help in lifting your arm.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often work on strengthening their deltoidei muscles.
meanings.sent3: The deltoidei muscles are like little shoulder bodyguards.
meanings.sent4: Her deltoidei were as strong as steel cables.
meanings.sent5: The bulging deltoidei gave him a powerful appearance.
